description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Arrow of Retribution</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link> <link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Bow</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Arrow of Retribution.
Auto-Equip The Darkin Bow.
flavorText: What if, over time, the man that became the Darkin remembered himself, prompted by the mortal voices within? What if, instead of overcoming those voices entirely, he came to believe in them?
name: Varus

description:
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link> <link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Bow</style></link>. 
<link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Bow</style></link> activates twice and has max +10|+0.
descriptionRaw:
Auto-Equip The Darkin Bow. 
The Darkin Bow activates twice and has max +10|+0.
flavorText: Varus was empowered, bolstered, reminded of who he was and what he had yet to become. He embraced the sum of his parts instead of working against them--and when they acted, they acted as one.
name: Varus

description:
You may put any Cultist cards into your deck during deckbuilding.
Once you have played 3+ Cultist spells, draw a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Varus</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
You may put any Cultist cards into your deck during deckbuilding.
Once you have played 3+ Cultist spells, draw a Varus.
flavorText: "We will seek out our betrayers, and we will bring them oblivion." - Varus
name: The Arrow of Retribution

description:
Give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and give an ally +1|+0 this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chain of Corruption</style></link> in hand. 
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Varus</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an enemy Vulnerable and give an ally +1|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Chain of Corruption in hand. 
Create a Varus in your deck.
flavorText: "Pity those who cross me." - Varus
name: Varus' Chain of Corruption

description: When you play a spell or <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>equip</style></link> an ally, give me +1|+0 (max +5|+0) until the next time my bearer <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell or equip an ally, give me +1|+0 (max +5|+0) until the next time my bearer strikes.
flavorText: Heartlights Kai and Valmar were not the first to bear the bow and host Varus' inhuman power... but they were the first to remind him of his lost humanity.
name: The Darkin Bow

description: Once you've <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Once you've Equipped an ally this game, grant me Elusive.
flavorText: Person, plant, animal... the Darkin's corruptive influence spares no one and nothing.
name: Blooming Cultist

description:
Once you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, I cost 2 less. 
Grow an ally to 5|5 this round.
descriptionRaw:
Once you have Equipped an ally this game, I cost 2 less. 
Grow an ally to 5|5 this round.
flavorText: "There is so much power in us." - Varus
name: The Sudden Surge

description: When <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy nexus.
descriptionRaw: When Equipped allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy nexus.
flavorText: It didn't matter where the power came from--her goddess would not care. What mattered was the glory it would bring her through the monsters she slayed.
name: Buhru Cultist

description: Deal 1 to the enemy nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy nexus.
flavorText: Yes... this weapon will certainly please Mother Serpent.
name: Piercing Bolt

description:
Once you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, I cost 2 less.
Draw 2 and give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Once you have Equipped an ally this game, I cost 2 less.
Draw 2 and give them Fleeting.
flavorText: Though Ibaaros' old bones moved slow, the waters that surged ahead of him moved at an almost incomprehensible speed.
name: The Unending Wave

description: When I'm summoned or once you've <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or once you've Equipped an ally this game, create a Gem in hand.
flavorText: She sought an end to the conflict between Sun and Moon, day and night. The bow offered power, though it came with a terrible cost - yet she pledged herself to it anyway, hoping that it would stop the war once and for all.
name: Lunari Cultist

description:
Once you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, I cost 2 less.
Give an ally <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
Once you have Equipped an ally this game, I cost 2 less.
Give an ally SpellShield this round.
flavorText: Look to the night sky and focus your eyes on a small swathe of the firmament. Now imagine all those lived within it, all the knowledge gained and all the experiences lived over countless millennia. Imagine all that information condensed into a shard that could fit into the palm of your hand. Think of how much wisdom you would hold. How much power.
name: The Expanse's Protection

description: Your <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> allies have <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Your Equipped allies have Overwhelm.
flavorText: The Winter's Claw was right. The Avarosans HAD been too soft. It was time for a new leader, one that would not seek to unify the Freljord through peace, but rule over it.
name: Icevale Cultist

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy. If you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, copy me.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite the strongest enemy. If you have Equipped an ally this game, copy me.
flavorText: Anaakca moved with such speed that the Freljord itself seemed to follow in her wake. Those who survived her butchery soon felt their skin freeze, and their hearts still.
name: The Unforgiving Cold

description: Once you've <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, create a new spell that costs 2 in hand and set its cost to 0.
descriptionRaw: Once you've Equipped an ally this game, create a new spell that costs 2 in hand and set its cost to 0.
flavorText: "I have always been willing to sacrifice in the name of science. No matter the personal risk, the limitless, inexhaustible power I gained through the exchange was more than reward."
name: Ambitious Cultist

description: Deal 1 to a unit. If you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, copy me with the same targets.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. If you have Equipped an ally this game, copy me with the same targets.
flavorText: If discord be the cacophony of destruction, then butcher on.
name: The Violent Dischord

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Draw 1 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>. 
You may spend 9 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Ibaaros</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Draw 1 at the next Round Start and give it Fleeting. 
You may spend 9 mana to play me as Ibaaros.
flavorText:
"Steer clear, steer clear, of the strait of Daray,
Where the waters whisper and the winds betray,
Where sea beast and bird so seldom foray,
For fear o' the darkness deep 'neath the strait of Daray."
- Bilgewater rhyme
name: The Darkin Harpoon

description: I have +1|+1 for each card you've drawn this game. I can only be blocked by enemies with 4 or more Power.
descriptionRaw: I have +1|+1 for each card you've drawn this game. I can only be blocked by enemies with 4 or more Power.
flavorText: Ibaaros, the Champion of the Dunes, lifted himself through the water. His blood coursed with that same familiar yearning from years before. To serve. To obey. To submit.
name: Ibaaros

description: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round. If it dies this round, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy Vulnerable this round. If it dies this round, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Will you stand, or cower?" - Illaoi
name: Test of Spirit

description: When I'm discarded, summon me. When you summon a Mecha-Yordle, grant it a random keyword.
descriptionRaw: When I'm discarded, summon me. When you summon a Mecha-Yordle, grant it a random keyword.
flavorText: Big or small, inanimate or otherwise, if there's a doodad you want found, try Skrappy's! Just don't ask Skrappy where it is, because she is not a believer in cataloguing.
name: Skrappy's Partsapalooza

description: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING or destroy a unit's equipment.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING or destroy a unit's equipment.
flavorText: The cold spares nothing and no one.
name: Fracture

description: When I'm summoned, grant allies +1|+1 for each different subtype you’ve summoned this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant allies +1|+1 for each different subtype you’ve summoned this game.
flavorText: "...an' there was a BIG creature that cared for aaaaaaall of the LIL' creatures..." - Ingvar the Younger
name: Warden of the Tribes

description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> allies +1|+1 this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw:
Daybreak: Give Daybreak allies +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Grant Nightfall allies +1|+0.
flavorText: In the twilight hours and just before sunrise the owl can be heard, its call a reminder of the liminal places between dusk and dawn.
name: Twilit Protector

description:
<link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw:
Flow: I cost 2 less.
Play: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: What is this one's role in this strange and gruesome show? Ah, more than audience, she is observer, the lens through which all things pass and must be held up against truth and beauty. The Witness!
name: The Witness

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: The Kashuri spies are mostly observers, but they are well-equipped in case they are ever attacked.
name: Scintillating Artifact

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>The Empyrean</style></link> and grant it <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Flow: Summon a The Empyrean and grant it Ephemeral.
flavorText: "The shape of the water reflects the shape of your desire. Tell me, wanderer... what do you see?"
name: Dragoncaller

description:
<link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: I cost 2 less. 
When I'm summoned, draw a spell.
descriptionRaw:
Flow: I cost 2 less. 
When I'm summoned, draw a spell.
flavorText: "Master Doran believed each eye of the Spirit of Wuju offered unique insight into a person's being. But try as I might, all my helm's lenses can behold are different shades of green. What am I missing?" - Lui, Disciple of Doran
name: The Spirit of Wuju

description:
<link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit or landmark. If it has any attachments, destroy them first.
descriptionRaw:
Flow: I cost 2 less.
Recall a unit or landmark. If it has any attachments, destroy them first.
flavorText: "You are not worthy of the power you hold." - Rhaast
name: Unworthy Soul

description: You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Styraatu</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: You may spend 8 mana to play me as Styraatu.
flavorText: As the Targonians pondered where they should scatter the Darkin weapons, one of their kind suggested the lands that would become known as Zaun. Buried deep within the walls of the cavernous and winding passageways would be perfect, they assumed. Far from human reach. But not Chirean.
name: The Darkin Harp

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Draw 2, then reduce those cards' costs by 2.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Draw 2, then reduce those cards' costs by 2.
flavorText: Styraatu burst through the processing plant, furious and impatient. Her rage was known even before the tendrils of madness found their way into her mind, but now... now she would make them all pay. First here, in this land of technology, then south, where she would war alongside her general once again.
name: Styraatu

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: Refill 2 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Flow: Refill 2 spell mana.
flavorText: If he had things his way, NOBODY would get in.
name: Zaun Bouncer

description: When I'm summoned, create a random new 2 cost spell in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random new 2 cost spell in hand.
levelupDescription: You've played 6+ new spells this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played 6+ new spells this game.
flavorText: Seraphine and her dad never talked about her "secret" trips to the Undercity, or the subtle upgrades she kept making to her stage. She was sure he'd forbid her from participating in Zaun's grungiest musical duel, but one night he tucked the flyer under her door. All she could do was smile, and get to work.
name: Seraphine

description:
When I'm summoned, create a random new 2 cost spell in hand.
When you play a new spell that costs 2 or less, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, create a random new 2 cost spell in hand.
When you play a new spell that costs 2 or less, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: She'd never heard anything like it--maybe nobody had. Together, on that stage, they made something new.
name: Seraphine

description: Deal 2 to a unit. If you've played 6+ other new spells this game, deal 1 to another unit. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit. If you've played 6+ other new spells this game, deal 1 to another unit.
flavorText: Simple and clean.
name: High Note

description:
Deal 2 to a unit. If you've played 6+ other new spells this game, deal 1 to another unit. <style=Variable></style>
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Seraphine</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to a unit. If you've played 6+ other new spells this game, deal 1 to another unit. 
Create a Seraphine in your deck.
flavorText: Simple and clean.
name: Seraphine's High Note

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Reduce the cost of the most expensive spell in your hand by 1.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Reduce the cost of the most expensive spell in your hand by 1.
flavorText: You wouldn't find his name on any of the blueprints, or credited in any of the songs, but those in the know agreed: Acorn was the heart of the whole operation.
name: Acorn, the Hextechnician

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand and give it Fleeting.
flavorText:
"Oh dear, sounds like rain."
"Huh? Dad, it's so bright outside."
"Quick, cover the blueprints! It's a BRAINstorm!"
"Daaaaad."
- Seraphine & her father
name: Inspired Plans

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a spell that costs 5 and set its cost to 2.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a spell that costs 5 and set its cost to 2.
flavorText: "It's not about how big your voice is, it's about how big your heart is!" - Fanclub President
name: Fanclub President

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies. If you've played 6+ new spells this game, deal 3 instead. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to all enemies. If you've played 6+ new spells this game, deal 3 instead.
flavorText: "Zaun! I hope you're ready to scream, 'cause we're about to sink this place all over again!" - Zaun Diva
name: The Zaun Diva

description: Deal 1 to all enemies. If you've played 6+ new spells this game, deal 3 instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies. If you've played 6+ new spells this game, deal 3 instead.
flavorText: "The Diva's show is totally worth the hearing damage!" - Fans, probably
name: Fatal Encore

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
<link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
Flow: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand.
flavorText: "I can't hear you, Zaun!" - Seraphine
name: Crowd Pleaser

description:
Draw 2.
<link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: Reduce those cards' costs by 2.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 2.
Flow: Reduce those cards' costs by 2.
flavorText: Music's all about timing, but once in a while you've gotta just let loose.
name: Drum Solo

description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> an enemy.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: I strike an enemy.
flavorText: As the assault continued, larger and even more ferocious creatures poured from the widening gate. The city of Belveth was lost, though, as the cruelty of fate would have it, its name would live on.
name: Camouflaged Horror

description: <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Camouflaged Horror</style></link> <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Camouflaged Horror strikes an enemy.
flavorText: With each corpse, the Void grew. Knowledge. Matter. Perspective. It began to feel. It began to want.
name: Feed the Void

description: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. Give a unit "I take double damage and if I would die, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> me instead" this round.
descriptionRaw: Predict. Give a unit "I take double damage and if I would die, Obliterate me instead" this round.
flavorText: "Only fools seek power beyond their control." - Xerath
name: Curse of the Tomb

description: When you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit, reduce the cost of the next Darkin Unit you play by 1.
descriptionRaw: When you slay a unit, reduce the cost of the next Darkin Unit you play by 1.
flavorText: The altar throbbed with life once more, shaking the sands around it with a slow and steady beat. Each of Xolaani's disciples felt the same beat deep in their heart. Every muscle, every thought, every moment... they were all hers to control.
name: The Altar of Blood

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavorText: "Chase what you want. Without mercy." - Ruin Runner
name: Swinging Glaive

description: When I am summoned, or when you gain the attack token, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Ghastly Band</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I am summoned, or when you gain the attack token, summon a Ghastly Band.
flavorText: "The players are ready, the stage is set, our audience is waiting--Maestro, if you please!" - Boisterous Host
name: Opulent Foyer

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: For each ally that died this round, grant all allied copies of it <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Round End: For each ally that died this round, grant all allied copies of it everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: "I don't know what wicked magic they work, and I don't WANNA know. All's I need to know is that if they rise up, they're gettin' killed. Again." - Watcher on the Isles
name: Wraith of Echoes

description:
When you summon an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally, grant it +1|+0.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When you summon an Ephemeral ally, grant it +1|+0.
Nightfall: Summon a Sapling.
flavorText: Far from the Shadow Isles' shores are copses of trees thought long-dead, crooked and unmoving to all but the most keen observer--who will note that in that moon-drenched soil, new life stirs.
name: Moonlit Glenkeeper

description: Draw an ally with 5+ Power, or grow an ally to 5 Power this round.
descriptionRaw: Draw an ally with 5+ Power, or grow an ally to 5 Power this round.
flavorText: "Few are given the opportunity to serve in the Trifarian Legion. Do not squander this chance." - Trifarian Assessor
name: Legionary Charge

description: Destroy an enemy's equipment. An ally and that enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an enemy's equipment. An ally and that enemy strike each other.
flavorText:
"One two, watch him scream,
The soldier's caught on fi-re,
three four, watch him burn,
Tibbers wants a py-re!" - Annie
name: Brutal Skirmish

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Reforge.
flavorText: For months, he'd slogged through the cold and the rain, a thankless task with no end in sight. And yet the end came. Finally, he would make something of himself.
name: Rune Squire

description: Create an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Icathian Mirage</style></link> in hand that costs 0 this round, or create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Golden Spatula</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create an Icathian Mirage in hand that costs 0 this round, or create a Golden Spatula in hand.
flavorText:
Legends say the original wielder of the Golden Spatula was a marine creature of outstanding culinary prowess--one who sought to become a warrior as strong and fearless as Jax.

Other, more credible legends say that particular legend was fabricated entirely by a certain cook who was very, VERY lost in the sauce.
name: Icathian Myths

flavorText: It definitely does something.
name: Golden Spatula

description: You may spend 5 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Joraal</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: You may spend 5 mana to play me as Joraal.
flavorText:
"My son, listen now. That shield must never be touched. Long ago, it was gifted to our house on the condition that we keep it safe, and leave it be. It is my responsibility, and when I pass, it will be yours. Do you hear me now? You must never climb to it again. You must never touch it."
"But mama, the voice inside... it cries to me. It sounds so sad."
"...All the more reason, my son."
- Lady Fortis and her son
name: The Darkin Aegis

description: Your opponent's spells cost 2 more while I am attacking.
descriptionRaw: Your opponent's spells cost 2 more while I am attacking.
flavorText: A mighty Ascended tactician known as the Aegis of Eternity, Joraal seemed impervious to attack, even for the immortal god-warriors of Shurima. But the war against the Void raged on, and as resilient as Joraal's body was, it was his mind that broke. And how it broke.
name: Joraal

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tumble</style></link> in hand or if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Tumble in hand or if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: "Our target was once human, which means it's smarter than your average beast. One wrong move could spell death for us all. Stay within eyesight of one another, call out anything suspicious--but above all else, remember..."
name: Vayne

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a 0 cost <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tumble</style></link> in hand or if you have one, reduce its cost by 3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a 0 cost Tumble in hand or if you have one, reduce its cost by 3.
flavorText: "...shoot to kill."
name: Vayne

description: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> an ally with an equipment in hand that costs 2 or less. It starts a free attack.
descriptionRaw: Equip an ally with an equipment in hand that costs 2 or less. It starts a free attack.
flavorText: "I bring swift death." - Vayne
name: Tumble

description:
If you've attacked 2+ times this round, I cost 5 less.
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw:
If you've attacked 2+ times this round, I cost 5 less.
An ally strikes an enemy.
flavorText: "Purifying bolts." - Vayne
name: Condemn

description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If you've attacked 2+ times this round, I cost 5 less.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Vayne</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally strikes an enemy. If you've attacked 2+ times this round, I cost 5 less.
Create a Vayne in your deck.
flavorText: "Purifying bolts." - Vayne
name: Vayne's Condemn

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> me with an equipment that costs 2 or less from hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Equip me with an equipment that costs 2 or less from hand.
flavorText: "Though the woman seems a competent enough fighter, her grief is fresh and threatens to overwhelm her. Despair is indeed a compelling motivator--I should know--but unbridled so? Mayhap she is looking to die..." - From the personal journal of Sirius Rowill, Zealous Ranger-Knight
name: Widowed Huntress

description: When I'm summoned, give <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> allies <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give Equipped allies Barrier this round.
flavorText: "The boy is a liability. I was adamant he should not be taken along on our hunt, as still he refers to the foul creature as his 'sister'. It is a naivete so profound, it is frankly revolting. Yet, I suppose I do pity him well enough. At the very least, this will be an important lesson for him." - From the personal journal of Sirius Rowill, Zealous Ranger-Knight
name: Kind-hearted Recruit

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> allies +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give Equipped allies +1|+1 this round.
flavorText:
"Janan, was it? What can you tell me about Sirius?"
"Oh, Ranger-Knight Rowill? A few years ago, he had his title revoked. Apparently, he willfully disregarded every order he was given. Seems he does whatever he wants and doesn't take 'no' for an answer."
"Ah."
"So... why did you let him join this hunt, anyway?"
"I didn't."
"Then, why... oh, right. Fantastic."
- Vayne and Janan, Widowed Huntress
name: Zealous Ranger-Knight

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> me with an equipment that costs 2 or less from hand. 
The first time I would die while <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link>, fully heal me and destroy the equipment instead.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Equip me with an equipment that costs 2 or less from hand. 
The first time I would die while Equipped, fully heal me and destroy the equipment instead.
flavorText:
"Kian, if you're reading this... I'm hopefully dead. I can't control what's happening to me. The blood under my nails won't wash off. I'm so itchy. I scratch and scratch but nothing helps. It hurts. I just want it to stop. If I'm still alive somehow, promise me you'll stop trying to find me.

I would ask for forgiveness, but I don't deserve it. Be good to mother, okay?"
- Crumpled letter found in a torn-up satchel
name: Bloodcursed Harpy

description: The first time I see an ally <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link>, grant me <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time I see an ally Equipped, grant me Tough.
flavorText: "Back, foul creature! Rend even a single hair from Purity's immaculate coat and I will see that you suffer AN ETERNITY OF AGONY!" - Sirius Rowill, Zealous Ranger-Knight
name: Steadfast Elkin

description:
If an ally died this round, I cost 2 less.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> me with an equipment that costs 2 or less from hand.
descriptionRaw:
If an ally died this round, I cost 2 less.
Play: Equip me with an equipment that costs 2 or less from hand.
flavorText: "I've had Maggie since she was a pup. She may be long in the tooth, but she's still sharp as a fresh-whetted blade. I'd give my life for hers--and I know she'd give hers for mine." - Janan, Widowed Huntress
name: Faithful Wolfdog

description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other, or an <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy, then is unequipped.
descriptionRaw: An ally and an enemy strike each other, or an Equipped ally strikes an enemy, then is unequipped.
flavorText: "Fish, meet face!" - Ionian Hookmaster
name: Fish Fight
